## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e1d9ac1bcb7cd29ef795a3e97f9d777c02d3059cb21c76322f71f59899cfc905)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'upload-testflight-action' @ 99.1.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
